headline: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (CFG) Positioned to Capitalize on Structural Catalysts
summary: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is one of the 10 best banking stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On January 23, Kevin Heal from Argus increased the firm’s price target on Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE:CFG) from $60 to $72. The analyst maintained his Buy rating on the shares, with an upside potential in […]

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell CFG and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Citizens Financial Group’s 24% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 17.5%, and its stock price has climbed to $63.62 per share. This performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: C3 AI shares plummet as company cuts 26% of workforce, posts wider loss than expected
summary: Shares of enterprise artificial intelligence company C3 AI sunk after widely missing earnings and announcing layoffs under new CEO Ehikian's restructuring plan.

raw.headline: C3 AI shares plummet as company cuts 26% of workforce, posts wider loss than expected

headline: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) Valuation Check As Shares Show Sustained Momentum
summary: Why Citizens Financial Group is on investors’ radar Citizens Financial Group (CFG) has drawn attention recently as investors reassess large regional banks, with its share price reflecting mixed short term moves alongside stronger performance over the past 3 months and year. That backdrop is prompting closer scrutiny of how Citizens Financial Group’s current valuation, profitability, and balance of consumer and commercial banking activities might fit into a diversified portfolio for investors...

headline: The 'Great Wealth Transfer': A $3 trillion opportunity for Black business owners is on the horizon
summary: Researchers forecast 6 million small- and medium-sized businesses, or SMBs, will be available for acquisition by 2035.
